name: Family Resource Center at Community AbilityPath - San Mateo County
description: AbilityPath's Family Resource Center provides parent-to-parent support, outreach, information and referral services to families of children with special needs and disabilities, and the professionals who serve them. Primary focus is on supporting families of children 0-3 years of age, but will provide support to any individual up to age 22. Services include; support groups, prevention programs, parent mentors support, education training and assistive technology support. Services are available to
